title: Figma Auditory Learning Path
description: A personalized learning path for intermediate learners with auditory learning style focusing on Figma.
goals: Gain proficiency in using Figma for personal learning projects

milestones.title: Introduction to Figma
milestones.description: Understand the interface, basic tools, and file management in Figma

milestones.title: Design Principles in Figma
milestones.description: Learn about design principles and applying them in Figma projects

milestones.title: Advanced Techniques in Figma
milestones.description: Explore advanced features like prototyping, collaboration, and plugins in Figma

prerequisites: Some familiarity with basic Figma concepts
